mapper.select: select * from INSHInsuredhis where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
delete from INSHInsuredhis where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}

update INSHInsuredhis set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},personid = #{personid},businessproposalformno = #{businessproposalformno},businesspolicyno = #{businesspolicyno},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},relation = #{relation},fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi},nodecode = #{nodecode} where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
